scripts.build:common: cd ./packages/nocodb-sdk; pnpm install; pnpm run build
scripts.install:common: cd packages/nocodb-legacy; pnpm install ../nocodb-sdk; cd ../nc-gui; pnpm install ../nocodb-sdk
scripts.start:web: pnpm run build:common ; cd ./packages/nc-gui; pnpm install ../nocodb-sdk; pnpm install; ANT_MESSAGE_DURATION=0.5 pnpm run dev
scripts.test:travis: git log --pretty=format:'%h' -n 1 --skip 1 | xargs  lerna run test:travis --since
scripts.lerna:install: git log --pretty=format:'%h' -n 1 --skip 1 | xargs  lerna bootstrap --ignore nc-cli --since
scripts.updated:xc-migrator: lerna run publish --scope xc-migrator && lerna run xc && lerna publish && pnpm install -f xc-cli
scripts.install:local:dep: cd packages/nc-lib-gui;pnpm uninstall -S xc-lib;rm package-lock.json; pnpm i ../../../xc-lib-private; cd ../xc-instant;pnpm uninstall -S xc-lib xc-lib-gui;pnpm i ../../../xc-lib-private;pnpm i ../xc-lib-gui
scripts.install:pnpm:dep: cd packages/nc-lib-gui;pnpm uninstall -S xc-lib; pnpm i -S xc-lib@latest; cd ../xc-instant;pnpm uninstall -S xc-lib xc-lib-gui;pnpm i -S xc-lib@latest xc-lib-gui@latest;pnpm i ../xc-lib-gui
